subSections.name: Normal
textExplanationDetails: Magnetometer measure environmental magnetic field and changes of magnetic fields of magnetic objects.
3-axis magnetometer measure values of the x, y and z axes field, and total field of magnetic objects.
Total field can be measured with accurate orthogonality correction between 3-axis values.
Sensorpia Co. has accurate orthogonality correction technologies.

subSections.name: Satellite
textExplanationDetails: 3-axis magnetometer measure values of the x, y and z axes field, and total magnetic field.
Total field can be measured exactly by accurate orthogonality correction between 3-axis values.
Sensorpia Co. has accurate orthogonality correction technologies.
Magnetometer was developed for scientific satellite and has heritage.
Attitude control is important for satellites, and the attitude can be controlled using the earth's magnetic field.

mainTexts: Magnetometers measure changes of magnetic fields of magnetic objects.
3-axis magnetometers measure values for the x, y and z axis field, and total field of magnetic objects.
Total field can be measured exactly by accurate orthogonality correction between 3-axis values.
Sensorpia Co. has technologies of accurate orthogonality correction.
Magnetometers manufactured by sensorpia Co. are highly sensitive even under water. Since the change in magnetic filed is not affected by seawater, they are mainly used for defense.
Sensoria Co. manufactures magnetometers with very low power and low noise.

subImageAndDetails.title: 3-axis flux-gate magnetometer
details: Light mass and low power consumption designed for satellite
Attitude sensing using 3-axis components of earth magnetic field

mainTexts: Attitude control is important for satellites, and the attitude can be controlled using the earth's magnetic field.
Magnetic torquers and 3-axis magnetometers are used to control the attitude of satellites.
Sizes and characteristics of magnetic torquers can be adjusted according to requests of customers.
Sensorpia Co. manufactures magnetic equipments. It provides measurement and analysis services.

Equipment that can be manufactured and used for analysis services are a DC B-H tracer and an AC magnetic tester. The DC B-H tracer is a device to measure hysteresis curve of magnetic materials, and the AC magnetic tester is used to measure magnetostriction and magnetic hysteresis loss.

circleAboveTexts: SENSORPIA company was established in 2006. The company produces magnetic sensors and magnetic instruments which have been developed through technologies accumulated for more than 30 years. Main products are 3-axis flux-gate magnetometers and magnetic dipole moment sources for defense and satellite. In addition, other custom designed products such as precision magnetic measuring instruments and magnetic sensors are also available. Testing services are also available using magnetic testing equipments in Sensorpia.n
circleBelowTexts: Magnetic sensors have been used for defense and satellites. Sensorpia Co. has produced high-precision magnetic sensors for various domestic customers since 2006.

Magnetic measuring instruments are necessary to produce magnetic sensors of high performance. Sensorpia Co. has many kinds of self-developed measuring equipment and can manufacture equipment according to requests of customers.
